#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int isPrime(int n)
{
    int count = 0;
    for(int i=1;i<n-1;i++)
    if(n%i==0)
        count++;

    if(count == 1)
        return 1;
    else
        return 0;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int k = 29;
        int n;
        cin>>n;

        int sum=0;

        for(int i=k;i<=n;i++)
            {
                if(isPrime(i))
                sum += i;
            }

        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }
}
